speaker: feesh
dialog: no more income for my fellow gamers ;-;

speaker: froggie
dialog: Hey, can I ask you a question?

speaker: froggie
dialog: Is bathwater in demand around these parts...? Can't you find something better to sell...?

speaker: froggie
dialog: Sorry, was that too rude a question?

speaker: feesh
dialog: no, it's fine -- there's no point in crying over spilled bathwater... ;-;-;-;-;-;-;-;

speaker: feesh
dialog: It seems this world has undergone something very sinister...Folks like me just started permanently distorting left and right ;-;-;-;-;

speaker: feesh
dialog: oh how beautiful i once was... now im HIDEOUS!@!@#!@%@#%^^@!!!!!! Entire towns just started distorting so badly that business has been failing ever since... In extreme cases, no one can ever move!

speaker: froggie
dialog: ...Ah, so in desperation, you started selling bathwater...?

speaker: feesh
dialog: m-mayhaps. LISTEN, WE ALL GOTTA EAT SOMEHOW...! ;-;-;-;-;-;-;-;-;

speaker: cat
dialog: man, poor guy. i hope you find more bathwater to sell!
